resources.string: Could not connect to Play games services, your highscore won\'t be saved
There was an issue with sign-in, please try again later
You need to sign in to do this

You\'ve got a month to make as much cash as you can while staying one step ahead of police\, rival drug dealers and the loan shark who\'s loaned you some starting capital \n\n Can you do it\?ddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddddd dsdasds sdasdddasd asd
Nobody around here\'s going to buy this
The App Crashed - Please email me a report
As the loan shark\'s men batter down your door you can\'t help but wonder where you went wrong
You\'ve made enough to survive…\nbut for how long…
You\'ve definitely made enough to live\, but not enough live long
You\'ve made enough to retire in India
You\'ve made enough to retire to Bulgaria
With your ill gotten gains you manage to retire to a private island in the Bahamas
Acid is a powerful hallucinogenic drug that alters your perception of the outside world.
Cocaine can make you feel on top of the world, very confident, alert and awake.
Clubbers take ecstasy to feel energised, happy, to stay awake and to dance for hours.
Hashish acts somewhat as a sedative, causing a mellow, relaxed feeling.
A small dose of heroin gives the user a feeling of warmth and well-being.
Reduces sensations in the body, giving you a floating or detached feeling as if the mind and body have been separated.
When smoked, Opium causes a short-term high that includes relaxation, pain relief, reduced anxiety and impaired alertness and coordination
Poppers were part of club culture from the 1970s disco scene to the 1980s, and the 1990s rave scene made their use popular.
Shrooms can cause colours, sounds, objects and even time to distort to the user.
Speed is a stimulant that can keep you awake for hours and jumping around like a nutter.
Cannabis is naturally occurring - it is made from the cannabis plant and causes a relaxed and generally happy high.
I better avoid him until I have some cash
The loan shark sits behind his desk with an almost imperceptible grin on his face.
The loan shark stands smoking a cigar whilst two large men stare you down.
Their\'s not much use going to the bank with no money…
The security guards eye you up as you enter the bank
The cashier smiles at you as you walk up to the counter with an envelope full of money
He won\'t be too happy if I show up with no money…
I can\'t afford this just now\, maybe I could come back later…
No point in going there when I\'m healthy…
Time seems to pass slowly as you wait to be seen by the doctor…
As you\'re walking through an alley a shady looking man approaches you and draws a knife. \n\nHe manages to steal £%1$s before %2$s getting away
There\'s a severe shortage of %1$s which has made the price skyrocket
Cheap %1$s have flooded the market making %2$s worthless
As you walk around a corner you\'re confronted by a %1$s.
You managed to lose him in a crowd
The police officer hit\'s you with his baton, dealing %1$s damage…
The drug dealer attempts to stab you but narrowly misses…
The Armed Officer shoots and hit\'s you square in the %1$s for %2$s damage…
The officer tries to attack you but narrowly misses…
The drug dealer stabs you\, damaging you by %1$s…
As the officer shoots\, you hear a bullet whizz by your %1$s…
As you fall to the floor\, you\'re quickly handcuffed and sent to jail
As the drug dealer stabs you again you feel yourself losing consciousness…
You feel a dull thud in your %1$s and suddenly you fall to the ground in a heap…
You manage to hit the %1$s in the %2$s…
You hit the %1$s in the %2$s\, dropping him to the floor…
The police officer takes a hard hit and falls to the ground…
The dealer falls to the floor dead…
The officer takes a hit to the %1$s and passes out…

string-array.name: runAwaySuccess
string-array.item: You run around a corner and hide in a shop, they run by without seeing you…
You duck into an alleyway\, quickly managing to lose your pursuer…
you blind the attacker then quickly escape…

string-array.name: runAwayFail
string-array.item: You try to run away but you\'re quickly grabbed…
As you start to run you trip over…
